author: Staff Correspondent
title: Spring arrives
text:
0 Like 
The city ushered spring with flowers, festivity and fanfare. People from all walks of life were seen wearing colourful attires, flower jewellery, matching with the flowers that bloom in spring. Youthfulness of spring was celebrated with songs and dance performances in the capital city. A little girl dressed in yellow saree celebrates first day of spring.Artiste Puja Sengupta performs at spring festival in Dhaka University's Charukala premises.Spring is synonymous with colour. A woman shows her palm of her hand, stained with powder colour in this photo taken on the first day of spring. Artistes perform at Dhaka University's Charukala premises, marking the first day of spring. Performers dressed in colourful attires, welcome spring with traditional dance at spring festival in Charukala. Flower is another name of spring. This is why flowers are always used as an essential prop in spring dance performance.
